title.rendered: Self defense Florida – PART 1 NO non-sense

content.rendered:
Self defense Florida Wing Chun Martial Arts – article part 1 

SELF DEFENSE FLORIDA NO NON-SENSE

The proliferation of comprehensive self defense Florida programs in North America is a sign of the growing awareness for training as a key for protection. The proper execution of self defense mechanisms only happen through instruction, mentoring and consistent practice.

SIFU OCH Martial Arts School of self defense Florida, Florida strives to deliver this three-pronged approach to its students. Our teachers are recognized as the best in their self defense specialization ensuring they only offer top-of-the-line instruction. The instructors take careful approach in preparing the students to execute principles learned during classes. They guide the students to process this important knowledge and to turn into skills and then have them perform it intelligently and effectively in real life scenario’s and situations against resisting partners/opponent’s.  We stop at nothing for our students to rigorously apply martial arts protocols and disciplines into life skills in and out of our Kung Fu Martial Art Centre.

Self-defense Programs

SIFU OCH Martial Arts School recognize the importance of variety for self defense florida programs. Every person is unique in strength, agility, and skills so choosing a program that would fit individuals is a feat in itself. We guarantee to make your choice inform and guided.

Here is a list of our program offerings:

Wing Chun Kung Fu

The Wing Chun Kung Fu has a long history. Its founding dates back to China’s Ching Dynasty about 300 years ago. How it developed as an established martial arts form has many versions yet what is certain is that this technique is proven effective. Wing Chun Kung Fu focuses on sudden contraction and relaxation and the application of quick, effective and direct strikes along the centerline. There is also available Women’s self defense florida. Learning the techniques of this Kung Fu style can be done in speed while enhancing fighting capabilities and reaction time.  Wing Chun Kung Fu under Sifu Och is a no-nonsense approach to close quarter combat and realistic self defense family protection.

The goal of this martial arts is to teach you how to protect yourself and your family at the shortest time possible.

http://youtu.be/jOqykjocbtQ

The practitioners of Wing Chun Kung Fu includes Bruce Lee, Wong Shun Leung, Ip Man (Yip Man), Simon Lau, Yip Ching, Yip Chun, Moy Yat, recently by MMA (Mixed Martial Art) and Cage fighting practitioners

SIFU OCH Wing Chun Kung Fu Lakeland Martial Arts Gym is headed by Sifu Justin Och a Black and Gold Sash practitioner in the art of Wing Chun (Ving Tsun) Kung Fu. He has trained under many well-known and certified instructors all over the world and has done advanced training in England, Switzerland, Germany, France and Italy. He has been recognized by the Eastern USA Hall of Fame as a Leader in Combative Wing Chun Kung Fu in Lakeland Florida USA and as a National Instructor of the Art of Wing Chun Kung Fu and Close Combat systems.

If you are looking for a realistic system that doesn’t focus on tournaments or point sparring but instead is looking to increase your speed and defensive skills this is the martial arts for you. (Part 2 Here)

For more info watch this videos
